choose.when: select title as postTitle, contents, category_no as categoryNo, no from post order by no desc limit 1
select title as postTitle, contents, category_no as categoryNo, no from post where category_no=#{categoryNo } order by no desc limit 1
choose.otherwise: select title as postTitle, contents, category_no as categoryNo, no from post where category_no = #{categoryNo} order by no desc
